Subtitle Introduction: I code simple things and I love what I do.
Paragraph Introduction: I started web development in 2019 on a self-taught basis, before enrolling and attending the Wild Code School for 5 months in 2020. I learned JavaScript-based technologies on the front-end and on the back- end. My wish now is to help my clients develop their online presence and develop their websites.
Question Introduction: You need a piece of advice for one of your projects?
